521120.name: Slightly Magic - Music Soundtrack
521120.description:
The full Slightly Magic soundtrack written and recorded by Allister Brimble.

Contains the 5 main music tracks plus short jingles as found on the extras section of the game, in high-quality mp3 format.

  • Track 1 Slightly's Theme
  • Track 2 In the Castle
  • Track 3 Spooky Woods
  • Track 4 Underwater World
  • Track 5 Cool Magic
  • Track 6 Falling Under A Spell
  • Track 7 Magic Time
  • Track 8 Wishing Well
  • Track 9 Rising Tension
  • Track 10 Final Countdown
  • Track 11 Fare Thee Well
521120.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
